2/ These false representations of the True Market ( $ SPY $ SPX $ QQQ $ DIA $ DJI $ IWM $ RUT ) are specifically designed to confuse retail in Market turns. They are like the fake video of all is OK" robbers play on the security monitors while the real robbery is going on."

The Truth is 99% of traders can't see a correction or crash coming because they are looking at false representations of the Market. $ SPY $ SPX $ QQQ $ DJI $ DIA are distorted versions of the True Market and are easily manipulated by a handful of stocks by artificial weightings.
